Package suncertify.ui

Provides GUI components and utilities shared between application UI.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ErrorHandlerAction A Wrapper for a swing action which adds the behavior of a proper unified handling for Throwables thrown by wrapped action.
ErrorReportPanel Panel which displays an error report.
FileSelectionComponent Custom GUI component which consist of a text field and a button for browsing and selection for a file in file system.
FilterAction A base implementation for swing actions which want to add a behavior dynamically to another swing action.
LengthLimitFormatter A formatter to limit the number of characters allowed in a JFormattedTextField to specific size.
LengthLimitFormatter.LengthLimitDocumentFilter Filter to control the number of characters inserted/replaced in a document.
PositiveIntegerFormatter A formatter to control entries in a JFormattedTextField to be only positive numbers.
ThreadedAction A wrapper for a swing Action which adds the behavior of executing wrapped actions in a separate thread.
UIUtil Contains utility methods useful for GUI components.
 

Package suncertify.ui Description

Provides GUI components and utilities shared between application UI.
